column1: Smoque BBQ////There are no short of 5 star reviews
column2: yet I want to add mine. Been there twice
column3: very impressed with the efficiency of the operation
column4: everything runs so smoothly; staff are super nice. Noticed that when they got the table ready for us
column5: they even cleaned the high chair for the baby. Then when we left our iPhone there by accident
column6: the guy chased us down the block to return it. Great food great people!
